author: Saeed Shah
title: Pakistani Militant Leader Gives Fiery Friday Sermon Despite Government Crackdown on Group
text:
ISLAMABADâ€”While Pakistan says it is shutting down Jamaat-ud-Dawa, its leader, Hafiz Saeed, who has a $10 million U.S. bounty on his head, delivered a blistering attack on Islamabad and Washington at Friday prayers.
Under U.S. pressure that could put Pakistan on an international terror financing watch list, Islamabad this week said it is seizing the assets of Jamaat-ud-Dawa, known as JuD, which is blamed for the 2008 attack on the Indian city of Mumbai that killed 166 people.
...
